baseline_groups.claim_summary: Imposed Fact-Check treatment reduces intention to share fake news on Facebook
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=-0.045, p=0.005. Robust across all control specifications. About 4.5pp reduction in sharing intent.

global_notes: Survey experiment with ~2500 French Facebook users. Three conditions: Alt-Facts only, Imposed Fact-Check, Voluntary Fact-Check. Strong and robust negative treatment effect on sharing intent. 66 specs total.
